title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Education for Digital Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply a framework for evaluating digital information source credibility with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can develop PBL-based teaching-learning designs for digital information literacy tailored to social studies curricula
Learners can create learning materials incorporating peer feedback using interactive tools provided by the Canvas platform
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
